samba doesnt support NTMLv2 well: type secpol.msc into your win7 start-menu searchbox

Go to: Local Policies > Security Options and then find "Network Security: LAN Manager" authentication level. Once there, change the Setting from "Send NTLMv2 response only" to "Send LM & NTLM -- use NTLMv2 session security if negotiated."
